Description:                               =
============================================

Your sister Margaret wrote you about a strange invention. When you arrive to visit her, she's vanished! What's left behind are the traces of a bizarre event: Margaret's soul has been broken into fragments and placed in different worlds, where theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll be used as part of a mysterious device. It's up to you to save not just Margaret's soul Ã¢â‚¬â€œ but the fate of each world in turn as you navigate the labyrinths and plot twists in this exciting hidden-object puzzle adventure game!

Battle the evil scientist in the bonus game
